title: The Raidships
description:
The black ships came to make Whit Alder a slave. Instead, they made him a legend.
After sky-borne raiders ravage his village and take him captive, Whit finds himself in an alien world.It is the beginning of an odyssey that starts in the slave markets of Thelos and ends in a lost city hidden behind a millennium-old mystery. Along the way, Whit will ignite a rebellion and uncover an ancient lie destined to shake the foundations of an empire.The Raidships is the first installment in the new series Riven Skies. Riven Skies chronicles a future where the isolated remnants of humanity struggle to begin again in a hostile universe. It is a universe filled with peril and adventure, where the greatest threat to survival is not the alien nature of new worlds, but the violent nature of men.Join the adventure. Read the Kindle preview for The Raidships, and climb aboard.
author: A.D. Wynterhawk
